sql.query: UPDATE papers p, conferences c, sched_confs sc SET p.locale = c.primary_locale WHERE p.sched_conf_id = sc.sched_conf_id AND sc.conference_id = c.conference_id
UPDATE papers SET locale = c.primary_locale FROM sched_confs sc, conferences c WHERE papers.sched_conf_id = sc.sched_conf_id AND sc.conference_id = c.conference_id
